name: flightradar24
description: A Claude Desktop MCP server that helps you track flights in real-time using Flightradar24 data.

examples.title: Check Flight Status
examples.description: Ask for the status of a specific flight.
examples.prompt: What's the status of flight UA123?

examples.title: Show Current Flights at Airport
examples.description: Request to see all flights currently at an airport.
examples.prompt: Show me all flights currently at SFO

examples.title: Emergency Flights Query
examples.description: Ask if there are emergency flights in the area.
examples.prompt: Are there any emergency flights in the area?

examples.title: International Flights Arrival
examples.description: Request information on international flights arriving within a timeframe.
examples.prompt: Show me all international flights arriving at SFO in the next 2 hours
